headline: Fear of Flood if Dam Opens Just a Crack
abstract: Lawmakers fear allowing new testimony would tie up the Senate indefinitely and open the door to a cascade of new accusations.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON â€” In the end, the impeachment calculation nearly all Senate Republicans are making is fairly simple: They would rather look as if they ignored relevant evidence than plunge the Senate into an unpredictable, open-ended inquiry that would anger President Trump and court political peril.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
